paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on TTR variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: Familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy with lung involvement

individual_records.phenotype_details: Progressive lower-extremity weakness, heart failure symptoms, pulmonary infiltrates, and amyloid deposition in lung tissue.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: He was started on diflunisal and referred to an amyloidosis program at a local specialty hospital.

functional_data.summary: Detected an amino acid sequence abnormality in the TTR protein suggestive of hereditary TTR amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is associated with hereditary TTR amyloidosis.
key_quotes: Liquid chromatography tandem mass spectrometry was performed and detected an amino acid sequence abnormality in the TTR protein (Thr60Ala) strongly suggestive of hereditary TTR amyloidosis.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR variant was extracted successfully.
